descriptionlist.description: Tweak count right on your settings app! REQUIRES either Orion, Shuffle or the app TweakSettings. It's NOT compatible with normal settings without preference organizers, and probably never will idk. NOTE: it ONLY counts tweaks with preference bundles, hence why it's located in the settings app. I didn't feel like bloating up the code counting the total number of packages or making filters. This gives a concise and accurate count of the tweaks you have right there on the section you're standing. Pretty handcrafted icon by @jam_minty.
